description: As a QlikView developer , time to time you need to integrate different tools with your QlikView application . If you can integrate QlikView with R , you can accomplish real time fraud detection , customer segmentation and data mining capabilities to your organization. In this course I am covering R integration which is always problematic for QlikView developers. You will learn integrating right pieces together and how up and run with out problem. This course covers two more amazing R integration compnents one is OpenCPU which you can run on Cloud and secondd one is Microsoft R which including new capabilities for your integration needs.
title: Learn QlikView with R Integration
